description:
1. To collect biological baseline data that could detect habitat characteristics before and after construction to determine what the effects of restoration and/or enhancement of the Yankee Fork.
  2. To collect physical baseline data that could detect habitat characteristics before and after construction to determine what the effects of restoration and/or enhancement of the Yankee Fork.
  3. To determine what the current condition physically and biologically of the pond series prior to construction, summer 2012. The pre- construction baseline data should provide the team with knowledge of what areas before and after.
title: Yankee Fork Salmon River habitat restoration effectiveness monitoring
